TextLibrary.Text: Drong
Here's your Sea Serpent, Drong.
Here's your Sea Serpent, Drong.
Here's your Sea Serpent, Drong.
Here's your Sea Serpent, Drong.
Yum yum yum, Drong so happy. You his best friend.
Yum yum yum, Drong so happy. You his best friend.

If you say so. Now... you said you have a surprise for me?
If you say so. Now... you said you have a surprise for me?
If you say so. Now... you said you have a surprise for me?
If you say so. Now... you said you have a surprise for me?
Yes! You will be so happy! You are such good friend to Drong, that he is going to join you.
Yes! You will be so happy! You are such good friend to Drong, that he is going to join you.
Yes! You will be so happy! You are such good friend to Drong, that he is going to join you.
Yes! You will be so happy! You are such good friend to Drong, that he is going to join you.
Join me? Are you serious?
Join me? Are you serious?
Join me? Are you serious?
Join me? Are you serious?
Yes! We will travel the world together, finding new things to eat. It will save you much time bringing things to Drong.

Queen Gwendholyn is just going to love this...
Queen Gwendholyn is just going to love this...

What's a Queen Gwendholyn? Can Drong eat it?

No! Okay, look, you can come along, but there are some things you just can't eat.

Okay. Drong do anything for his new friend.
